text: "The Everlasting" is a 1998 song by Welsh band Manic Street Preachers and is the second single from their fifth studio album This Is My Truth Tell Me Yours. It went to number 3 in Iceland, number 9 in Scotland, number 11 in the United Kingdom, number 22 in Ireland, number 47 in the Netherlands and number 88 in Germany. ==Track listings== All music was written by James Dean Bradfield and Sean Moore except where indicated. All were lyrics written by Nick Jones except where indicated.
